attributes.action: Revoke the licence of all Nissan Micra drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Gordon,

Thank you for all your help recently with the flooding and terrorists...top notch work all round. I quite like you, although I am confused when a Scotsman supports the England Rugby team.

Still, there's nothing like a good bandwagon which brings me to my subject.

Gordon, you must ban Nissan Micra's from the road. If you do this I will personally be held liable for this guarantee:

THE CRASHES ON BRITAIN'S ROADS WILL FALL.

I love you Gordon, but this is just getting silly, Micra drivers must be stopped. Don't worry, they're going slow enough, it shouldn't be a problem...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
